channel.title: A running server problem PLEASE HELP!?
channel.description:
:mad: Listen up peeps I HAVE A PROBLEM! BTW i am using l337 pksource
Ok so ive ran everything my server is already and up for action.... It says running pimpscape..NORMAL THEN! exeption in thread main "main" java.lang.numberformatexception:for input string:" " at java.lang.numberformation.exception.forinputstring<unkown source> at java.lang.integer.parseInt.<unkown source> at java.lang.integer.parseInt.<unkown source> at shophandler.loadshops<shophandler.java:117> at shophandler.<init><shophandler.java:30> at.server.main<server.java:29>
I therefore would like to point out, i was using shophandler, i dont know whats happened, if its not ONLY shophandler with a problem but shop.cfg or somin, i dont know whats happenning just please help!
;) :mad: :( :eek:[tt][/tt]

item.title: A running server problem PLEASE HELP!?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

How about hmmmm, download the source again, in another place, then just
copy shophandler.java and shop.cfg and paste it into the file of your source your
working on.

Read full topic

item.title: A running server problem PLEASE HELP!?

item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

You have an error on whatever you editted, go into your shophandler or shop.cfg and delete what you editted.

item.title: A running server problem PLEASE HELP!?
item.dc:creator: @r4p3dscape r4p3dscape
item.description:
@r4p3dscape wrote:

:mad:
Listen up peeps
I HAVE A PROBLEM!
BTW i am using l337 pksource

Ok so ive ran everything my server is already and up for action…
It says running pimpscape…NORMAL
THEN!
exeption in thread main “main” java.lang.numberformatexception:for input string:"
" at java.lang.numberformation.exception.forinputstring
at java.lang.integer.parseInt.
at java.lang.integer.parseInt.
at shophandler.loadshopsshophandler.java:117
at shophandler.shophandler.java:30
at.server.mainserver.java:29

I therefore would like to point out, i was using shophandler, i dont know whats happened, if its not ONLY shophandler with a problem but shop.cfg or somin, i dont know whats happenning just please help!

:mad: :eek:[tt][/tt]
